item.title: SingleItemToListConverter<T>
item.description: When you import data into C# using the Newtonsoft JSON framework you can be caught out by incorrectly formatted JSON. When this happens your code can throw an exception or (even worse) the application can crash. Collections of data are sometimes not correctly formatted, especially when they contain one item. They should always have the surrounding square brackets [ ] but these can be missed off. You could also always want a JSON property to be added to a collection.
